CustomField.description: For messages migrated that were sent from NAV employees without a Salesforce user, the CRM_From_Ident__c field will store the from information. Messages created in Salesforce will be connected to either a community contact or internal user. Returns the external users actor id if the message is from external.
CustomField.formula: IF(CRM_From_Contact__c != null, CRM_From_Contact__r.Account.CRM_Person__r.INT_ActorId__c, IF( CRM_From_User__c != null, CRM_From_User__r.CRM_NAV_Ident__c, CRM_From_Ident__c ) )
CustomField.label: From Ident Formula
